title: Blood Solstice
description: Enter a world of fierce wolves, stunning magic and romance...In the final installment of The Tale of Lunarmorte, Caia is caught between the most powerful beings in her world, and they are all desperate to use her for their own means. While Caia struggles to find her purpose, tragedy strikes close to home, and time runs out.Now she must decide if she will join the extremists she was trying to destroy... or bring them all down on her own terms...
author: Samantha Young
